Title: Wait Until Dark
Writer: Frederick Knott (based on the play by), Robert Carrington (screenplay), Jane-Howard Hammerstein (screenplay)
Actors: Audrey Hepburn, Alan Arkin, Richard Crenna, Efrem Zimbalist Jr.
Plot: A recently blinded woman is terrorized by a trio of thugs while they search for a heroin-stuffed doll they believe is in her apartment.
